descriptions.briefDescription: Network Administration Visualized - network management system
descriptions.fullDescription: Network Administration Visualized is an advanced software suite to monitor large computer networks. It automatically discovers network topology, monitors network load and outages, and can send alerts on network events by e-mail and SMS, allowing for flexible configuration of alert profiles.
